mountain.title: Mountain Room
mountain.description: Expansive views of Table Mountain and the Twelve Apostles mountain range.

classic.title: Classic Room
classic.description: Located around the main pool deck, these rooms offer direct access to the pool from a private patio.

clubClassic.title: Club Classic Room
clubClassic.description: North-facing with views of Lion’s Head and partial sea views. Features two accessibility rooms with wheelchair access.

premierMountain.title: Premier Mountain Room
premierMountain.description: These double-sized rooms feature private spa baths and magni cent views of the Twelve Apostles mountain range.

premierPool.title: Premier Pool Room
premierPool.description: North-facing rooms with spacious balconies, views of Lion’s Head and partial sea views overlooking the pool area.

premierSea.title: Premier Sea Room
premierSea.description: Direct sea views overlooking the Atlantic Ocean which can be enjoyed from a private balcony.

cabana.title: Cabana Room
cabana.description: Located on the ground  oor with a spacious patio, sea views and direct access to two cabana pools.

luxury.title: Luxury Room
luxury.description: Spacious sea-facing rooms with a comfortable private balcony and outdoor spa bath.

suite.title: Suite
suite.description: Each individually styled Suite offers spacious interiors, an outdoor spa bath and two balconies with delightful sea views.

penthouse.title: Penthouse
penthouse.description: With expansive and luxurious interiors, the Penthouse is 160 m2 of sheer sea-facing splendour.

adventurePad.title: Adventure Pad
adventurePad.description: Located around the main pool deck, these rooms offer direct access to the pool from a private patio.

packageOne.title: WHALE OF A TIME
packageOne.rates:

Apartments from R 600 pp sharing (sleeps 4)
